entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -17.7°C

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:36 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 4:36 PM AST Monday 09 January 2023
